sentences.en: Again backbend as you inhale , and as you exhale.
sentences.cn: 重复吸气展开, 呼气扭转的动作.

sentences.en: Always breathing ( inhale exhale properly ) your body can feel very relaxing.
sentences.cn: 经常清楚的吸气、吐气,身体会觉非常轻松.

sentences.en: Do you inhale when you smoke?
sentences.cn: 你抽烟时是否把烟吸入肺里?

sentences.en: Don't inhale dust into your lung.
Inhale and place your hands on either side your right knee.
sentences.cn: 吸气同时将手放在右膝两侧.

sentences.en: Inhale cold , exhale warm . inhale hatred, exhale love. what goes around, comes around?
sentences.cn: 我们吸入的是冷气,呼出的是热气,吸入的是恨, 呼出的是爱. 我们种善因, 结善缘,得善果.

sentences.en: It is dangerous to inhale ammonia fumes.
It is very uncomfortable to inhale the smoke of smoker.
sentences.cn: 飞机吸入抽烟者所吐出的烟是件很不舒服的事.

sentences.en: Method Rats were made to inhale acrylonitrile in static enclosure cabinet.
sentences.cn: 方法采用大鼠呼吸道静吸入染毒方法研究丙烯腈对大鼠血液的毒性.

sentences.en: Myra lit another cigarette and inhaled deeply  (= breathed in a lot of smoke ).
sentences.cn: 迈拉又点上一支烟，深深地吸了一口。

sentences.en: On the exhalation, lift your legs to vertical again, and then inhale.
sentences.cn: 呼气时, 再一次举起双腿垂直地面, 接着吸气.

sentences.en: On the inhale, feel yourself holding still on the ladder.
sentences.cn: 吸气时, 感觉你站在楼梯上不动.

sentences.en: Smokers who inhale are likely to become addicted to nicotine.
sentences.cn: 吸烟的人容易对尼古丁上瘾.

sentences.en: The No.9 even has a plastic tip that glows when you inhale.
sentences.cn: 9号有个塑料头,当你吸烟是会发光.

sentences.en: Then slowly release the abdominal grip and inhale normally.
sentences.cn: 然后缓慢地放松腹部,正常吸气.

sentences.en: They are pleased to not inhale second hand smoke.
sentences.cn: 他们很高兴他们再也不会吸到二手烟了.

sentences.en: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE as you inhale, and downward as you exhale.
sentences.cn: 女被访者起身时吸气, 下蹲时呼气.

words.tran_cn: [临床] 吸入器；人工呼吸补助器
[临床] 吸入器；空气过滤器；吸入者

trans.tran_en: to breathe in air, smoke, or gas
